alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:27PM CDT until July 19 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EASTERN TIPTON...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brighton, or near Covington, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Covington, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Braden, Barretville, Egypt, Belmont, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Beaver and Canaan Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
